Header.title: Workshop Ticket Issuing Service
Header.paragraph: Using this service you can Issue directly to your EUDI wallet app the ticket required to access any ERUA Alliance organised workshop you have been accepted to participate in.
Header.wallet: To get a compatible wallet select your prefered store:

About.paragraph: ERUA is a European University Initiative that  offer students a rich and diverse environment with a shared pedagogical approach focused on project-based learning, societal challenges and critical thinking. ERUA develops personalised learning pathways in a multilingual, multicultural environment. We offer the framework and structures to allow students from different backgrounds to become part of a shared European experience

Features.title: Based on a trusted and secure European e-ID
Features.text: Following the latest EU regulations for building a trusted and secure European e-ID.

Features.title: User in full control
Features.text: Giving full control to users to choose which aspects of their identity, data and certificates they share with third parties, and keep track of such sharing

Features.title: EUDI Wallet Compatible
Features.text: The EUDI wallet is widely useable as a way of identification or to confirm certain personal attributes for the purpose of access to public and private digital services across the EU

Features.title: EBSI Compatilbe
Features.text: The EBSI trust framework and technical specification, providing interoperability in the Academic Sector across EU
